dialog.eventText: After stripping down to your naked form, you approach the mirror
confidently
anxiously
, eager to see the progress you've made in gaining
, eager to see if you've made any progress in gaining
, afraid of what you might see
After stripping down to your naked form, you lumber toward the mirror
confidently
anxiously
, eager to see the progress you've made in gaining
, eager to see if you've made any progress in gaining
, afraid of what you might see
Huffing and puffing from exertion, you've finally stripped down to your naked form, leaving your clothes strewn across your bed. You waddle towards your mirror
confidently
anxiously
, eager to see the progress you've made in gaining
, eager to see if you've made any progress in gaining
, afraid of what you might see
Your belly is not really even a belly... it's just flat. Your abs can be seen, indicating that your body fat percentage is quite low.
This flat tummy won't do. You must eat more!
Your belly looks fairly average. Not chubby, but not flat either. Your abs aren't visible any longer though, indicating a general lack of exercise.
You better cut down on the snacks, because it seems like the only direction your weight's moving is up.
You better start eating more if you want this tummy to grow.
Your belly is actually looking a bit chubby,
and much to your distaste,
and much to your delight,
you notice a slight roll of fat forming over your groin area.
What happened to your fat stomach and abs? How could you let yourself get this chubby?
There's still a lot of room to grow, however. You need to keep stuffing yourself to make your belly grow fatter.
Your belly,
much to your distaste,
much to your delight,
sits pudgy around your midsection, spilling over top your groin area slightly. You jiggly and squeeze it a bit,
self-conscious of just how visible it is nowadays.
annoyed that you even allowed your flat stomach to turn this soft. You have to lose this paunch!
slightly aroused but too shy to admit how much you're turned on by your newfound fatness.
loving the progress you're making in gaining, and eager to see just how far you can go!
worried that the added belly fat will affect your stamina in battle.
Your belly,
much to your distaste,
much to your delight,

now folds into two distinctive rolls; one that spills over top your belly button, and one that hangs lazily, covering your groin area. You lift your belly with both hands before letting it fall with an immense jiggle.

How could you let this happen? You used to be so thin and athletic, and now look... you became complacent! Years of effort and conscientiousness in maintaining your slender figure, now ruined, replaced by this disgusting ball of lard at your waist.

Amazing! You've really been working hard at stuffing yourself past your limits recently, and you've been especially conscious to avoid exercise whenever possible. Looks like your efforts are paying off nicely!
Your breasts are pretty average. Because you're so thin, there's not a lot of weight to go around, but at least your breasts have got their fair share. You squeeze them a bit,
not satisfied with their current size. You need to gain more weight.
content with their current size.
Now eyeing your breasts, they seem fairly average. Perhaps a bit bigger than usual, but not by much.
Unsatisfied, you pledge to eat more at the next meal to help your breasts grow.
Now eyeing your breasts, you notice they've grown, but not by much. You've been eating well, so it makes sense that they'd be bigger now.
Groping them a bit feels nice, but a bit unfulfilling. They need to be bigger.
Groping them a bit feels good, though. At least getting chubby has some benefits.
Now eyeing your breasts, you notice they're slightly rounder than usual. To confirm this belief, you squeeze them, and to your surprise they feel much softer than usual.
Well, at least your overeating has been good for something. Your breasts really have grown in size.
You're getting bigger everywhere, including your breasts. It won't be long before you're moving up another cup size now!

Now eyeing your breasts, you notice they're quite a bit rounder than usual. To confirm this belief, you attempt to squeeze them, but to your surprise, you find that you can't even fit your palms around them entirely!
It took getting fatter everywhere else for your boobs to grow, but damn it, they look good, and you can at least appreciate that about your recent weight gain.
You've gotten fatter everywhere, including your breasts, and it seems it won't be long until you move up another cup size at this rate!
You raise your arms horizontally to get a better look. They're quite toned, and no traces of fat can be seen on them.
You raise your arms horizontally to get a better look. Not much fat on your arms, but they do look a bit softer than usual.
You raise your arms horizontally to get a better look. A bit of under-arm fat hangs, but not much. That's to be expected. You've gained some weight, but not enough to have noticeable arm chub.
You raise your arms horizontally to get a better look. A bit of under-arm fat hangs.
You poke and squeeze it as if to confirm it's real, in denial that you could have this fat in a place that fat is not often familiar with.
You poke and squeeze it, excited that even your arms are getting chubby.
Further evidence that you're a growing girl.
Further evidence that you're a growing boy.
You raise your arms horizontally to get a better look. A distinct roll of under-arm fat hangs.
You poke and squeeze it as if to confirm it's real, in denial that you could have this much fat in a place that fat is not often familiar with. Further evidence that you've gotten undeniably big.
You poke and squeeze it, proud that even your arms have grown in size. Every inch of your body is expanding nicely.
Your thighs are quite toned. It's evident that you've been keeping up with your cardiovascular exercise routine.
You could afford to indulge a little here and there.
Your thighs seem a bit thicker than usual, but it's hard to tell. There's still a gap between your thighs, and they never rub together unless you force them to.
Your attention is now directed towards your thighs, which you've noticed have gotten a bit fuller. It makes sense given that you've been neglecting your diet recently.
No signs of cellulite or chub rub though, so at least there's that.
You're a bit disappointed at their size though. There's a lot of room for growth.

Your attention is now directed towards your thighs which have gotten to be quite thick now. Bending one leg and turning to the side allows you to see the the area of flesh that connects your butt to your thighs. You notice a bit of cellulite forming there, something you were previously unfamiliar with.
The sight of cellulite upsets you. You must get back in shape!
The sight of cellulite is slightly arousing, just further proof of how chubby you've been getting lately.

Your attention is now directed towards your thighs which are rich with decadent fat. Bending one leg and turning to the side allows you to see the cellulite-ridden area of flesh that connects your thighs to your butt. Spreading your legs apart, you can see a bit of red markings on your inner thighs, possibly stretch marks, possibly chub rub.
Either way, you're appalled by the sight. You must get back in shape!
Either way, you're aroused by the sight. You can't even walk without your thighs rubbing together, and it's visual proof of just how fat you've become.
In order to see your backside, you twist yourself around and look over your shoulder.
Your ass looks more fit than it does fat
, but you're certainly not complaining. That's what exercise will do for you.
. You might have to change up your routine if you want it to grow.
Your ass isn't particularly large, but it's also not small by any means. It's just... average.
As you gain more weight, it should grow more to your liking.
Your ass is looking pretty average. Maybe a bit bigger than usual, as you have put on some weight recently.
On second thought, the extra padding looks pretty good on you. You could get used to having a bigger butt, though the rest of your fat needs to go.
Not enough though, clearly. You have work to do.
Your ass is looking pretty thick. Putting your hands on your hips and checking out your side profile, you're actually pleasantly surprised at how far your rear extends.

Another benefit of gaining weight, you think to yourself. However, after turning back around and watching your belly jiggle from even that motion, you begin to wonder if the costs outweigh the benefits...
Impressive! You're really packing on the pounds and it shows!
Your ass is... quite large, to say the least. Putting your hands on your hips and checking out your side profile, and are amazed at how far your rear extends.
Curious, you take a step forward such that your belly is hidden from view in your reflection. You could very well pass as a thick
girl
guy

if one could only see your behind and nothing more, as your ass looks immaculate! But upon turning to face the mirror, your belly becomes impossible to hide. Sigh... You grab your belly and jiggle it a bit. This gut has to go!
You step away from the mirror and dress yourself in what you were wearing previously.
